Observable Compute Foundation Empirical Mapping of Technology Language Evolution
Lexicon Reports Framework Community API About

Observable Compute API

Public API for querying technology terminology evolution, legal-technical gaps, and conceptual clustering. Free tier: 100 requests/day. Premium tier: unlimited.

Quick Start

curl https://api.observablecompute.org/v1/concept/agentic-ai

Endpoints

GET /v1/concept/{slug}

Retrieve full concept data including definitions, sources, clustering, timeline.

{
  "id": "uuid",
  "canonical_term": "Agentic AI",
  "slug": "agentic-ai",
  "first_observed": "2025-10-15",
  "status": "emerging",
  "definitions": [...],
  "co_occurrence": [...],
  "timeline": [...]
}

GET /v1/search?q={query}

Search concepts by keyword, returns ranked results.

{
  "query": "reasoning",
  "results": [
    {
      "concept": "Multi-step Reasoning",
      "relevance": 0.95,
      "url": "/concept/multi-step-reasoning"
    }
  ]
}

GET /v1/clustering?threshold={0.7}

Retrieve concept clusters above correlation threshold.

GET /v1/gaps?severity={critical}

List legal-technical alignment gaps by severity.

GET /v1/timeline?concept_id={uuid}

Get evolution timeline for specific concept.

Authentication

Free tier requires API key (100 req/day). Premium tier requires subscription ($50/mo, unlimited).

curl -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY" \
  https://api.observablecompute.org/v1/concept/agentic-ai
Get Free API Key

Rate Limits

Tier Requests/Day Requests/Minute Cost
Free 100 10 $0
Premium Unlimited 100 $50/mo
Enterprise Unlimited 1000 Contact

SDKs & Libraries

Official client libraries coming soon:

  • Python: pip install observablecompute (planned)
  • JavaScript: npm install @observablecompute/api (planned)

Need Help?

Questions about the API? Contact our developer support or join the community discussion.

Observable Compute Foundation

A 501(c)(3) nonprofit research institute mapping technology terminology evolution and legal-technical alignment.
